_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Fabric Server
author: wowid3@example.com
description: High-performance Fabric modded Minecraft server with Zulu 21 Java. Optimized JVM settings for modded servers.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Fabric Server Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

set -e

cd /mnt/server

echo "=========================================="
echo "Fabric Server Installation"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""

# Check Java version
echo "Checking Java version..."
if command -v java >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    java -version
else
    echo "Java not found in installer container, but will be available at runtime"
fi

echo ""
echo "Installation directory: $(pwd)"
echo "SERVER_JARFILE: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
echo ""

# Check if server.jar already exists
if [[ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]]; then
    echo "✓ Server JAR file found: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
    echo "  Size: $(du -h ${SERVER_JARFILE} | cut -f1)"
else
    echo "⚠ WARNING: ${SERVER_JARFILE} not found!"
    echo ""
    echo "Please upload your Fabric server JAR file after installation."
    echo "Expected location: /home/container/${SERVER_JARFILE}"
    echo ""
    echo "You can:"
    echo "1. Upload via the Files tab in Pterodactyl panel"
    echo "2. Use SFTP to upload the file"
    echo "3. Download it using wget/curl in the console"
    echo ""
fi

# Create necessary directories
echo "Creating server directories..."
mkdir -p mods config world logs
mkdir -p kubejs/server_scripts kubejs/startup_scripts 2>/dev/null || true
mkdir -p patchouli_books 2>/dev/null || true
echo "✓ Directories created"

# Create EULA file
echo ""
echo "Creating eula.txt..."
cat > eula.txt << 'EOF'
#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).
eula=true
EOF
echo "✓ EULA accepted"

# Create default server.properties if it doesn't exist
if [[ ! -f "server.properties" ]]; then
    echo ""
    echo "Creating default server.properties..."
    cat > server.properties << 'EOF'
#Minecraft server properties
#Generated by Fabric Server installation
server-port=25565
server-ip=0.0.0.0
max-players=20
online-mode=true
white-list=false
pvp=true
difficulty=easy
hardcore=false
gamemode=survival
view-distance=10
simulation-distance=10
spawn-protection=16
max-tick-time=60000
enable-command-block=false
enable-query=false
enable-rcon=false
query.port=25565
EOF
    echo "✓ Default server.properties created"
else
    echo "✓ server.properties already exists"
fi

# Set proper permissions
echo ""
echo "Setting file permissions..."
chmod 755 . 2>/dev/null || true
chmod -R 755 mods config world logs kubejs 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 644 eula.txt server.properties 2>/dev/null || true

if [[ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]]; then
    chmod 644 "${SERVER_JARFILE}" 2>/dev/null || true
fi

echo "✓ Permissions set"

echo ""
echo "=========================================="
echo "Installation Summary"
echo "=========================================="
echo "Server JAR: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
if [[ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]]; then
    echo "Status: ✓ Ready"
else
    echo "Status: ⚠ JAR file missing - upload required"
fi
echo "Working Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "EULA: Accepted"
echo "Directories: Created"
echo ""
echo "Installation complete!"

if [[ ! -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]]; then
    echo ""
    echo "⚠⚠⚠ IMPORTANT ⚠⚠⚠"
    echo "Before starting the server, you MUST upload ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
    echo "to the server files directory."
    echo "=========================================="
fi

variables.name: Server JAR File
variables.description: The name of the server JAR file to run (must be uploaded before starting)

variables.name: Maximum RAM Percentage
variables.description: Maximum percentage of allocated memory to use. Default 95% ensures some memory for system overhead.

variables.name: JVM Arguments
variables.description: Additional JVM arguments for optimal performance. Includes G1GC tuning for modded servers.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players that can join the server

variables.name: View Distance
variables.description: View distance in chunks (2-32). Lower values improve performance.

variables.name: Simulation Distance
variables.description: Simulation distance in chunks (2-32). Lower values improve performance.

variables.name: Hardcore Mode
variables.description: Enable hardcore mode (players banned on death)

variables.name: Whitelist
variables.description: Enable whitelist (only whitelisted players can join)

variables.name: MOTD
variables.description: Message of the day displayed in server list
